name: CLOUD NINE HELICOPTERS PTY LTD
about: At Cloud Nine Helicopters Pty Ltd, we are dedicated to providing exceptional helicopter flight training and aviation services. Our school is committed to safety, excellence, and personalized instruction, ensuring each student receives the highest quality training. With a fleet of modern, well-maintained helicopters and experienced instructors, we cater to both recreational and professional pilots. Our comprehensive programs include private pilot licenses, commercial pilot certifications, and specialized training in various helicopter operations. We pride ourselves on creating a supportive and engaging learning environment, where students can achieve their aviation goals with confidence and skill. At Cloud Nine Helicopters, we are passionate about flying and dedicated to making your aviation journey a successful and enjoyable one.
services:
["Trial Flight
Recreational Pilot License
Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License"]
